turkish_example_sentence: Biz o samimi ilgiyi hissetmişsek, ona hemen güvenirdik.
english_example_sentence: If we had felt that sincere interest, we would have trusted him/her immediately.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы почувствовали тот искренний интерес, мы бы сразу ему/ей доверились.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz o samimi ilgiyi ______, ona hemen güvenirdik.
